name: Breakdown Boulevard
description:
This game was submitted for Fragment Jam and is currently unfinished.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Gerald just wanted to have a nice day by the lake. Feet kicked up, cold beer in hand, no worries, no wif- "GERALD, WHERE ARE MY SMOKES?" Gerald pretended not to hear. "GERALD!" "Not today. Not today..." muttered Gerald under his breath. "DON'T COME BACK IN THIS HOUSE UNTIL YOU HAVE MY SMOKES GERALD!" Gerald didn't think that would be a problem since he planned to relax until the sun goes down. "OH AND ANOTHER THING, SINCE IT'S YOUR DAY OFF-" Before she could finish, Gerald decided instead that a relaxing stroll through town would do him some good. Forgetting that today marked the start of the annual "Breakdance Bonanza", he took off into town to purchase a pack of smokes, unaware of the challengers that stood in his way.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Breakdown Boulevard is a short dancing/rhythm based adventure game.

Playing as Gerald, you venture into town on your day off to pick up a pack of smokes for your wife at the store. Along the way you meet several people who won't let you complete your shopping until you challenge them to a dance battle.

CONTROLS (Keyboard/Mouse)
  • WASD - Walk around
  • Mouse - Look around
  • Spacebar - Jump around
  • TAB - Enter dance mode
    • 1-9 NUMPAD - Dance moves
    • 1,2,3,4 - Swap between camera views
